item.title: Exploring the Book of Esther in the Tidy Verse
item.description: library(httr) library(tidytext) ## Warning: package 'tidytext' was built under R version 3.6.2 library(jsonlite) library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ───────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.0 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.1 ✓ dplyr 0.8.5 ## ✓ tidyr 1.0.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.3.1 ✓ forcats 0.5.0 ## Warning: package 'tibble' was built under R version 3.6.2 ## Warning: package 'purrr' was built under R version 3.
